resources.string: The language is already set to \u0020
GPS and Location Services are enabled. Turn them off afterwards for longer battery life
Run services while battery is low or battery saver is on
Feature is not in use yet!
Fragment given as paremeter is null!
List given as parameter is null!
Could not add a marker to map!
Permission to request the device location is required in order for the app to locate the device.
Never ask again selected, or device policy prohibits the app from having this permission. Please check app permissions from settings to allow the app to locate the device.
Couldn\'t download a trail file or open it from memory!
Location has been disabled and location tracking has been stopped
An error has occured when starting theme, and we can\'t track progress. Try to start the theme again to solve the issue.
An error has occured during tracking progress, and results for this marker cannot be saved.
Location given as parameter is null or empty!
Given trail ID is null or empty!
Given marker ID is null or empty!
Given theme ID is null or empty!
Position given as parameter is null or empty!
Given marker type ID is null or empty!
Given language is null or empty!
Do you want to finish trail?
Trail guidance is disabled because permission to access device location was denied. You can still use the app to look around.

Location tracking is not enabled, or isn\'t set to High Accuracy. You can look around without enabling location tracking, but we can\'t show your location on the map or give you guidance along a trail.\n\nDo you wan\'t to open setting to enable location tracking?
You don\'t seem to have an active Internet connection. The application might not be able to show the map for you without it. Some content may also be unavailable.

You don\'t seem to have an active Internet connection. The application needs to fetch data over an active connection on the first run in order to function. Please start the application when you have an active connection available!
Seems like you are going the other way around, keep walking and we\'ll start guiding you towards the other end.
Seems like you strayed from the trail. It\'s okay, just don\'t get lost.
Do you want to send feedback? The form will be opened in your web browser.
The trail was loaded from device memory, because no active Internet connection was detected. The trail might not be up to date, please use caution!
The device doesn\'t have a compass, so we\'ll use GPS bearing instead.
Sorry, we have no infromation about that location...
With slow internet connection, loading might take some time.
You\'ve answered all questions for this theme! Click the chequered flag to receive feedback.
DigiTrail app is currently tracking your location
Device\'s power saver has been activated

You can find different trails from the left hand menu. First select "Trails", then the location you\'re at, and then the trail you wish to travel.\nRemember that this is a work-in-progress application, and it might not function as intended. If something doesn\'t work correctly, try restarting the application.
Click \"Close\" when you\'re ready to return to the map.
You\'ve already visited this marker and answered it\'s question.
You need to be closer to the marker in order to open it.
Location is not known, we cannot confirm you are close enough to the marker.
You can answer the question by visiting the marker again. You can do this by pressing the marker icon on the map.
